alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:26PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tensas, northeastern Catahoula and southeastern Franklin Parishes through 215 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wisner, or 16 miles northeast of Harrisonburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cooter Point around 205 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
